DOC.brief_summary: Bed rest produce insulin resistance healthy volunteer . In study investigator aim investigate effect 8 day bed rest incretin effect alternate daily fast affect cognitive function insulin resistance produce bed rest . The subject randomize either 3 meal day ( isocaloric diet ) , alternate daily fast one meal/day every second day ( 25 % daily calorie need ) four meals/day every second ( 175 % daily calorie need ) . The investigator hypothesize : 1 . Bed rest reduces incretin effect 2 . Alternate daily fast improves cognitive function ( memory concentration ) compare isocaloric diet 3 . Alternate daily fast reduces insulin resistance produce bed rest compare isocaloric diet
DOC.brief_title: Bed Rest , Alternate Daily Fasting Incretin Effect
DOC.detailed_description: All subject undergo 8 day bedrest . Outcome measure perform , immediately bed rest period . The individual study period 10 day total .
DOC.criteria: BMI < 25kg/m2 VO2 max normal age Tobacco smoking Alcohol ingestion > 14 unit per week Diabetes nearby relative Resection small intestine History gastric bypass surgery Risk deep venous thrombosis Female
